law.catch_line: Powers of foreign guardian or conservator.

text.section: Notice of the time and place of the hearing shall be given not less than ten (10) days prior to the hearing to the ward's resident guardian, limited guardian, or conservator, if any, or to the ward's adult next of kin, if there is no guardian, limited guardian, or conservator in this Commonwealth. Proof of notice shall be made in accordance with the provisions of KRS 395.016. Notice may be waived as provided in KRS 395.016.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 487, sec. 18, effective July 13, 1990.
